content: Is it possible to have variables/flags defined in the lake file which then control the elaboration/macroexpansion of my code? Like for example having a enableX flag which then adjusts the macro elaboration to enable X?
Not completely sure, but I know Mathlib uses the lakefile to configure some things autoImplicit which are normally configured by set_option
Oh yep yep thanks for the pointer! I was able to get it to work in the end by using register_option, and then I can pass that in as a flag to lean in the package level
Kiran has marked this topic as resolved.
